outputs.output_descr: Establishing Capacity Development Facility (CDF) at Bahrain Institute for Public Administration (BIPA); the facility will be fully operational and mainstreamed among public sector institutions.
Promoting Bahrain Institute for Pulic Administration (BIPA)  as a reference point for Quality Assurance System of Capacity Development, where qualified human resources are put in place.

project_descr: Bahrain Institute for Public Administration (BIPA) - Establishing a Capacity Development Facility at BIPA in the Kingdom of Bahrain
project_title: Capacity Development Facility Established at BIPA
